description_text:
You have an ad on facebook saying $45 off order (BLACK45) it doesn't work.
I would like to order a set of pedals but at it stand they are almost $500
alone, really pushing my budget. If there is a way for you to get this to
work can you let me know please

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 9510 中
